story_19_04000/2401_1001_0300_10:
It’s making me sad to see you all down in the
dumps like this. Where’d all o’ your arrogant
laughter go?
story_19_04000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Your father, the king, made you a promise.
If the PML is a success here on Pasio, he’ll
name you as the heir to his throne.
story_19_04000/2401_1001_0700_10:
His highness won’t go back on his word just
because you lost a Pokémon battle...
That’s not gonna happen.
story_19_04000/2401_1001_0800_10:
I think you’ll be a great king someday—one who’s
worthy of succeeding your father on the throne.
story_19_04000/2401_1001_0900_10: Have a little faith, young master...
story_19_04000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Huh? Why would the royal manor be calling at
a time like this?
story_19_04000/2401_1001_1300_10:
This is Sawyer speaking.
Apologies, but now is not a good—
story_19_04000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Wh-what?! Are you sure?!
How could security let this happen?!
story_19_04000/2401_1001_1600_10:
We’ve got an emergency, young master!
I just got word that some thieves have
entered the royal manor, and...
